sentences.en: Don't use all that technical lingo try and explain in plain English.
sentences.cn: 别尽用那种专门术语--用普通的词语解释吧.

sentences.en: Economics is easy after you learn the lingo.
sentences.cn: 在学了专门术语后经济学就简单了.

sentences.en: I’d like to go to Greece, but I don’t speak the lingo.
sentences.cn: 我想去希腊，可我不会说希腊语。

sentences.en: If you join our course, you'll learn all the business lingo you need.
sentences.cn: 如果你参加我们的课程, 你将学到你需要的所有商业行话.

sentences.en: In record-business lingo, that means he wanted to buy the rights to the song and market it.
sentences.cn: 用唱片业的行话来说，就是他想买下那首歌曲的版权，然后包装推出。

sentences.en: It uses effectiveness coefficient method and lingo language program to achieve the models'solution.
sentences.cn: 本文采用功效系数法和lingo语言编程来实现模型的求解.

sentences.en: It's fun to use the local lingo.
sentences.cn: 使用本地的方言很有趣.

sentences.en: Jugs - Big wall lingo for Jumars or any other type of ascenders.
sentences.cn: 大岩壁术语,祝玛式上升器或其它种类的上升器.

sentences.en: Next , in giving them information and instructions , make sure that they understand your lingo.
sentences.cn: 首先, 这里必须包含不同观点所对应的不同情况.

sentences.en: Review job ads and employers'Web sites for industry terms and lingo youincorporate in your resume.
sentences.cn: 回顾招聘广告中以及雇主网页上可利用的行业条目和术语.

sentences.en: Searchers may use industry - specific lingo or generic terms.
sentences.cn: 搜寻者也许使用产业具体术语或普通用语.

sentences.en: Spoke to me in the lingo of fundamentalism.
sentences.cn: 用原教旨主义的行话与我交谈.

trans.tran_cn: 听不懂的话（指方言、术语等），隐语，外语
trans.tran_en: a language, especially a foreign one
